rules.name: Abnormal Skin Condition
rules.description: Alerts if skin condition is noted as abnormal and nurse input mentions 'wound' or 'redness'.
rules.generated_alert: Potential for impaired skin integrity. Assess wound care needs.

rules.name: Neurological Deficit
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates neurological deficit and nurse input mentions 'confusion' or 'weakness'.
rules.generated_alert: Neurological deficit identified. Monitor closely for changes in mental status or motor function.

rules.name: Cardiovascular Risk
rules.description: Alerts if cardiovascular CDSS alert is present and nurse input mentions 'chest pain' or 'palpitations'.
rules.generated_alert: Cardiovascular risk identified. Assess cardiac status and vital signs frequently.

rules.name: Oral Hygiene Deficit
rules.description: Alerts if oral condition CDSS alert is present and nurse input mentions 'poor hygiene' or 'difficulty eating'.
rules.generated_alert: Oral hygiene deficit. Implement oral care protocol and consult dentistry if needed.
